#summary This application
!ScanScrobbler allows you to use your Symbian Series 60 (3rd Edition and up) phone to scan a barcode on a CD, and scrobble the tracks from that CD to your last.fm account.

== Requirements ==
!ScanScrobbler has the following requirements
 * pyS60 (Python for S60 runtime, v 1.9.6 and up) [https://garage.maemo.org/frs/download.php/6359/Python_1.9.6_fixed.sis download]
 * [http://www.upcode.fi/mobile/pc_download.asp?language=1 UpCode] (a 1D and 2D barcode scanner)

== Information ==
 * For more help, please look at the *[Installation]* page. 
 * You can download the application from the 'Featured downloads' box, to the right. 
 * It's pretty straightforward to use but nevertheless, I've written a page on !ScanScrobbler [usage]. 
 * You can browse the [http://code.google.com/p/scanscrobbler/source/browse/#svn/trunk sources]. 
 * Perhaps you'd like to know some [background]. 
 * The [http://code.google.com/p/scanscrobbler/issues/list Issues] page also features planned enhancements for the future


== Modules/libraries used in this project ==
The sources make use of the following python modules :
    * [http://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/ Beautiful Soup]
    * [http://cyke64.googlepages.com/clipboard.py PowerClipboard for pyS60]
    * [http://code.google.com/p/pyscrobbler/ pyscrobbler]
